name: Add, New
usage: Used in buttons the plus icon is combined with the word "Add" plus the new item being added. For Exmple "Add User"

name: Remove, Cancel
usage: Used in buttons the times icon is combined in two ways either with "Cancel" or with the word "remove or delete" plus the item being removed. For Exmple "Remove User"

name: Collapse
usage: In combination with the "Expand" these icons toggle to reflect the opposite of state of complex content like Navigation, Sections of Content.

name: Expand
usage: In combination with the "Collapse" these icons toggle to reflect the opposite of state of complex content like Navigation, Sections of Content.

name: Less
usage: In combination with the "more" icon these icons toggle simple text content.

name: More
usage: In combination with the "less" icon these icons toggle simple text content.

name: Facebook
usage: icon representation of the social network

name: Instagram
usage: icon representation of the social network

name: LinkedIn
usage: icon representation of the social network

name: Twitter
usage: icon representation of the social network

name: Credit
usage: When denoting the types of education credits or certificates that are attached to a content item.

name: Time
usage: When an content object specifically only shows the time this icon is used.

name: download
usage: This icon must always be connected to the name of the type it is down loading.  This can either be the title of the asset or the type of asset. For Example, (Download) The complications of the heart, or (Download) Presentation

name: upload
usage: This icon must always be connected to the expected asset to uploaded. For Example, (upload) image

name: external link
usage: Any link that will drive the user to a page outside of the domain of the acc it is should have this icon postpended to it.

name: image
usage: denotes that the object is an image file

name: audio
usage: denotes that the object is a sound only file

name: anouncement
usage: time sensetive messages that are not evergreen news.

name: Filter
usage: these icons are usually combined with the word filter.
